verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah to the King (Hallelujah)
I will bless Your Holy Name
(Bless Your Holy Name)
Hallelujah to the Lamb of God (Hallelujah)
Hallelujah to the King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your works are wonderful to me
Although I'm often slow to see
That You always do what's best for me
As I entrust my life to You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My heart's desire is to please You
I only want to do Your will
Oh use me Lord to spread Your word
That others too may follow You.
